report.title: 2025 CBPF Annual Reports
report.subtitle: Delivering Hope and Recovery to Millions Across 23 Humanitarian Crises

totalFundsAllocated.description: The total amount of humanitarian funding distributed through Country-Based Pooled Funds (CBPF) mechanisms in 2025, representing direct financial support for life-saving and recovery interventions

totalContributed.description: The total number of contributions and donations made to humanitarian assistance through CBPF allocations, representing the collective support from donors and partners in 2025

cbpfOperations.description: Number of active Country-Based Pooled Fund operations worldwide

coverPhoto.description: Representative image from the 2025 CBPF Annual Reports video
